directions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add onion and celery; cook until the onion is translucent. Put the turkey, beans, chicken broth, corn and green chilies into the pot. Season with cumin and hot pepper sauce. Cover and cook for 15 to 20 minutes.
Ladle chili into bowls and garnish with shredded cheese and chopped parsley.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
2 (4 ounce) cans chopped green chile peppers
1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste
title: White Chili III
